alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Echols; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 7:16PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Echols, central Ware, central Clinch and northwestern Charlton Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 716 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southeast of Argyle, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Homerville, Stephen Foster State Park and Du Pont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Clinch; Echols; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
